author: ShortCircuit
description:

Ohsnap is back with a magnetic take on mobile gaming, and Linus is checking out their MCON controller to see whether its MagSafe mounting, Hall-effect triggers, and fold-out design make it a must-have upgrade for playing on your phone or using it as a standalone Bluetooth controller.
